sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
throughout an event or period of time
, se dogaja od začetka do konca določenega dogodka ali obdobja.

seg.quote: This dream recurred throughout her life.
We co-operated throughout with trade unionists.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja ali obstaja
throughout a place
, se dogaja ali obstaja povsod v nekem kraju ali prostoru.

seg.quote: The pictures can be transmitted by satellite throughout the world.
